casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brian Craig SEXTON. No. 483P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 27, 2008. Staples Hughes, Appellate Defender, for Sexton. Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 666 S.E.2d 889.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of October 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of October 2008."
